title: Ultra X Cute Dog Smiling : Heart Italian Charm Watch
features: The watch band is made of stainless steel and consists of 16 removable links
The watch face is approximately 0.98" x 0.98" (2.50 cm. x 2.50 cm.)
Band length: approximately 6.5" (16.50 cm.), Japanese movements, Batteries included
Note: the band comes unattached buyer need to attach the band themselves; Please see the instructions image.
description: The watchband is basically a 0.35" (0.88 cm.) medium size Italian charm bracelet that is adjustable to any size by adding or removing base links.
